name: Connect-Tac-Toe
description:
Game Mode 1: One To One

Place tic-tac-toe pieces to drop tokens in the corrisponding connect-4 lane. You win if you win the game of connect-4.

Game Mode 2: Whole Board

The player to either draw or win the round of tic-tac-toe inserts the entire board into the connect-4 board. You win if you win the game of connect-4

Created by Adam & Tom Bethell with additional game design by Sue Bethell

Under water video loop by Motion Stock under their terms of use https://www.motionstock.net/terms-of-use/

Tools: Godot, Aseprite, Ableton
